1600
Kg to ISS Orbit
1300
Kg to 500 Km Polar Orbit
1200
Kg to 700 km Polar Orbit
450
Kg to GTO

ORBITAL STAGE

Ensures accurate delivery to the desired orbit for every payload onboard, in mission profiles from LEO to GTO.

INTERSTAGE

Automotive grade composites applied on in-house developed automated tape-laying machine. Staging performed by pneumatic separation system.

UPPER STAGE HELIX ENGINE

Staged-combustion technology provides 30% higher efficiency than regular gas-generator cycle engines. The Helix engine and the turbopump are designed for additive manufacturing and automotive scale serial production.

STAGE STRUCTURES

Common-bulkhead tank design from inexpensive stainless steel construction. Validated by cryogenic proof test and flight ready.

HELIX ENGINE CLUSTER

Cluster of 9 staged combustion Helix engines with sea-level nozzles.

ORBITAL STAGE

Ensures accurate delivery to the desired orbit for every payload onboard, in mission profiles from LEO to GTO.

INTERSTAGE

Automotive grade composites Pneumatic separation system manufacturing

UPPER STAGE ENGINE

Staged-combustion technology High efficiency Automotive manufacturing network Turbopump design for additive manufacturing Proven design combustion technology

STAGE STRUCTURES

Common tank design Inexpensive stainless steel construction Validated by cryogenic proof test Flight ready

ENGINE CLUSTER

9 engines

ORBITAL STAGE

Ensures accurate delivery to the desired orbit for every payload onboard, in mission profiles from LEO to GTO.

INTERSTAGE

Automotive grade composites applied on in-house developed automated tape-laying machine. Staging performed by pneumatic separation system.

UPPER STAGE ENGINE

Staged-combustion technology provides 30% higher efficiency than regular gas-generator cycle engines. The engine and the turbopump are designed for additive manufacturing and automotive scale serial production.

STAGE STRUCTURES

Common-bulkhead tank design from inexpensive stainless steel construction. Validated by cryogenic proof test and flight ready.

ENGINE CLUSTER

Cluster of 9 staged combustion engines with sea-level nozzles.

Height                      30 m

Diameter                    2m

Stages                         3

Engines                   9  + 1 

Rideshare

8”, 15” or 24” ESPA class ports are available in the rideshare configuration. Customized  configurations and a top slot are available for large spacecraft upon request.

Dedicated

Payload can be directly mounted to the payload platform. This reduces complexity and cost.

Height                      30 m

Diameter                    2m

Stages                         3

Engines   9 first + 1 second 

Rideshare

To enable rideshare and constellation missions, the appropriate dispenser is attached to the payload adapter.

Dedicated

Payload can be directly mounted to the payload platform. This reduces complexity and cost.

Height                      30 m

Diameter                    2m

Stages                         3

Engines   9 first + 1 second stage

Rideshare

 

8”, 15” or 24” ESPA class ports are available in the rideshare configuration. Customized  configurations and a top slot are available for large spacecraft upon request.Payload can be directly mounted to the payload platform. This reduces complexity and cost.

Payload can be directly mounted to the payload platform. This reduces complexity and cost.
